english.segment1: Verse: Son of Man. Son of Righteousness. King of the Earth for sinners slain. I was lost. In darkness found. You ransomed my heart and i will sing
english.segment2: Chorus: (You are) My strength. (You are) My deliverer. (You are) The one who rescued me. (You are) My whole, my deliverer. Your love has set me free. (That's why I will). Bless The LORD, Oh my soul. Bless The LORD, Oh my soul. Bless The LORD, Oh my soul. Bless The LORD, Oh my soul
english.segment3: In the splendor of your majesty from deep within my spirit sings, Holy Holy (7x)
english.segment5: Bless The Lord Oh My Soul (12x)
